dom: <input autocomplete="given-name" id="firstname" maxlength="15" name="firstname" type="text" value=""/>
<input autocomplete="on" id="middlename" maxlength="1" name="middlename" type="text" value=""/>
feature: m i optional middlename text middlename 1

dom: <input autocomplete="family-name" id="lastname" maxlength="25" name="lastname" type="text" value=""/>
feature: last name and suffix lastname text lastname 25

dom: <input autocomplete="shipping street-address" id="addresslineone" maxlength="35" name="addresslineone" type="text" value=""/>
feature: street address no po box addresslineone text addresslineone 35

dom: <input autocomplete="shipping postal-code" id="zipcode" maxlength="5" name="zipcode" pattern="[0-9]*" type="text" value=""/>
<input autocomplete="shipping locality" id="cityname" maxlength="20" name="city" type="text" value=""/>
<input autocomplete="email" id="email" maxlength="64" name="emailaddress" type="text" value=""/>
<input autocapitalize="off" autocomplete="off" autocorrect="off" id="search" type="search" value=""/>
<input autocomplete="tel" id="primaryphone" maxlength="14" name="primaryphone" type="tel" value=""/>
